title: Julianna Margulies Ditches the Heart and Goes for Broke in Dietland

meta_data.description: A new red wig, a villainous role, a cable drama--it's a new era for Julianna Margulies. "Oh, it was delicious!" the Emmy-winning actor said about her turn as icy magazine... ...
